scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run tape:all | faucet
scripts.bundle:web: npm run bundle:web:js && npm run bundle:web:css
scripts.bundle:web:js: NODE_PATH=app browserify app/client/web -t babelify -g envify -g uglifyify > public/bundle.js
scripts.bundle:web:css: lessc $LESSC_MIN --autoprefix='> 0%' app/client/web/App.less > public/.bundle.css && mv public/.bundle.css public/bundle.css
scripts.watch: npm run watch:server & npm run watch:web:js & npm run watch:web:css & npm run reload:css & wait
scripts.watch:web:js: NODE_PATH=app watchify app/client/web -v -t [ babelify --sourceMaps=inline ] -g envify -p livereactload -o public/bundle.js
scripts.watch:web:css: npm run bundle:web:css && watch-run -p 'app/client/web/**/*.less' npm run bundle:web:css
